<style>
  .people-container {
    display: flex;

    justify-content: center;
  }
  .card {
    background: #ffffff;
    border-radius: 8px;
    padding: 16px;
    width: 30%;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
    display: flex;
    gap: 12px;
    align-items: flex-start;
  }
  .card img {
    height: 150px;
    object-fit: cover;
    flex-shrink: 0;
  }
  .card-content {
    flex: 1;
  }
  .card h2 {
    margin: 0 0 4px;
    font-size: 1.05rem;
  }
  .card h3 {
    margin: 0 0 8px;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    color: #666;
    font-weight: normal;
  }
  .card p {
    margin: 0 0 8px;
    font-size: 0.85rem;
    color: #333;
  }
  .card a {
    font-size: 0.8rem;
    color: #0066cc;
    text-decoration: none;
  }
</style>
